backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing user profiles and day logs with access control, providing CRUD-style methods for profiles and daily study/exercise entries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files describing their purpose, behavior, and UI roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining theme color variables for light and dark mode using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app with favicon and root mount element.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication gating, routing, layout, theming, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Public landing screen showing mascot, app intro, and login button when the user is unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading state, error handling, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting new users to enter their name and save their profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/components/daylog/ExerciseI: Form component for creating or editing an exercise item with description and reps, then saving or canceling.
frontend/src/components/daylog/ExerciseS: Displays exercise items with add, edit, delete, and completion toggle functionality, saving updates via mutation.
frontend/src/components/daylog/StudyItem: Form for creating or editing a study item with title and notes, supporting save and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/daylog/StudySect: Shows study items with add, edit, delete, and completion toggle features, persisting changes through a save mutation.
frontend/src/components/insights/Insight: Computes and displays streaks and weekly completion stats for study and exercise activity.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: App header with navigation, logo, and login/profile display that highlights the active route.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on authentication state and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current user’s profile using the actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useDayLogs.ts: Provides hooks to fetch all day logs and to save a day log with cache invalidation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInsights.ts: Fetches completion statistics for study and exercise items using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, plus utility component classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Loads today's day log data and renders study, exercise, and insights sections with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays past day logs, allows selecting a log, and supports copying unfinished items into today's log.
frontend/src/utils/copyUnfinished.ts: Merges unfinished study and exercise items into a current log while avoiding duplicates and resetting completion.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides date helpers for formatting timestamps and determining daily keys and whether a timestamp is today.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling custom color palettes, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including features, pending requests, and image requirements for a student study and exercise tracker. Contains metadata, existing feature list, and new feature requests awaiting implementation.
